original_text: And it came to pass at the end of the four hundred and thirty years, even the selfsame day it came to pass, that all the hosts of the Lord went out from the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 사백삼십 년이 끝나는 그 날에 여호와의 군대가 다 애굽 땅에서 나왔은즉

sentences.original_text: at the end of the four hundred and thirty years
even the selfsame day it came to pass
that all the hosts of the Lord
went out from the land of Egypt
